text: Sandro Dori (born Alberto Schiappadori; 21 December 1938 - 15 February 2021) was an Italian actor. He was known for his role as Dr. Zucconi in Be Sick... It's Free (1968) and in Il Prof. Dott. Guido Tersilli, primario della clinica Villa Celeste, convenzionata con le mutue (1969). Dori was born in Ostiglia, Italy. Dori died on 15 February 2021 in Civitavecchia, Italy, aged 82.Morto Sandro Dori, l'attore fu il perfido Dottor Zucconi al fianco di Alberto Sordi ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian voice actors
title: Sandro Dori
